emotions.text: Rate the level of valence you are feeling at this moment.
Rate the level of arousal you are feeling at this moment.

engagement.text: Right now I feel bursting with energy.
Right now I feel enthusiastic about my job.
Right now I am immersed in my work.

low_fatigue.text: How one feels at the moment is ofted described in terms of the state of charge of a battery, ranging from depleted to full of energy. Please indicate which of the following best describes your current state.

physical_comfort.text: Do you feel any physical discomfort? If yes, where?

sufficient_sleep.text: How many hours did you sleep last night
How would you rate the quality of your previous night's sleep?
This morning, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasim to get things done?

workplace_interactions.text: Since the last singal occured, was there any interpersonal conflict among the people you work with?

stress.text: Do you find your job stressful right now?

productivity.text: Rate your job performance in this moment.
